title: Herb Lubalin, Mother & Child
content:
[http://38one.com/logos/mother.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083635/http:/38one.com/logos/mother.jpg "http://38one.com/logos/mother.jpg")

What was this originally designed for?
author: Chris Dean

comments.content:
and please, dont say "mother and child magazine"

I need specific information to make an accurate reference.

BTW, does it matter that (AFAIK) it was never actually used?

hhp

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Herb_Lubalin_book_5859.jpg)
  
Quoted from _**[Herb Lubalin -- Art Director, Graphic Designer and Typographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083635/http:/www.amazon.com/Herb-Lubalin-Director-Designer-Typographer/dp/0931144280/sr=1-2/qid=1164561863/ref=pd_bbs_2/102-6601086-3916961?ie=UTF8&s=books)**_, by Gertrude Snyder & Alan Peckolick, 1985, American Showcase, Inc.

"The magazine _Mother & Child_ was proposed but never realized by Curtis Publications. Lettering by Tom Carnase, 1965."

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023083635im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Mother2_4301.png)
